;Subsequent this fascinating facet journey one more tour was waiting around for me: punctually at 2:30 pm eleven men and women had been assembled in front from the Babilonia Language College, prepared to go hiking on Mount Etna whose summit is situated at an altitude of over 3200 m. ;
